cards.name: Star-Lord
cards.bio: Charming leader with a knack for trouble, wielding element guns.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Star-Lord from Guardians of the Galaxy with element guns in a heroic pose.

cards.name: Gamora
cards.bio: The deadliest woman in the galaxy and a skilled assassin.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Gamora from Guardians of the Galaxy in combat stance with a sword.

cards.name: Drax the Destroyer
cards.bio: Muscle-bound warrior on a quest for vengeance.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Drax the Destroyer from Guardians of the Galaxy with knives ready for battle.

cards.name: Rocket Raccoon
cards.bio: Genius tactician and marksman in the form of a raccoon.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Rocket Raccoon from Guardians of the Galaxy wielding a blaster.

cards.name: Groot
cards.bio: Loyal tree-like being with the ability to regenerate and grow.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Groot from Guardians of the Galaxy in a protective stance.

cards.name: Nebula
cards.bio: Cybernetically enhanced warrior with a complex relationship with her sister, Gamora.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Nebula from Guardians of the Galaxy in a fighting pose.

cards.name: Yondu Udonta
cards.bio: Blue-skinned Ravager with a deadly Yaka arrow controlled by whistling.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Yondu Udonta from Guardians of the Galaxy with his Yaka arrow floating beside him.

cards.name: Mantis
cards.bio: Empathic alien with the ability to sense and manipulate emotions.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Mantis from Guardians of the Galaxy with her antennae glowing.

cards.name: Kraglin
cards.bio: First mate of the Ravagers, loyal to Yondu.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Kraglin from Guardians of the Galaxy with a blaster in hand.

cards.name: Ego
cards.bio: Mysterious celestial being with a god complex.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Ego from Guardians of the Galaxy in his human form, exuding power.

cards.name: Ronan the Accuser
cards.bio: Fanatical Kree warlord bent on destruction, wielding the power of the Orb.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Ronan the Accuser from Guardians of the Galaxy holding the Orb with malicious intent, the main villain.
